summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the supplemental or re- assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2282, for the improvement of Dexter Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 23456, under Ordinance No. 30606 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
